summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 31 December to end of Friday 31 December GMT
description: Friday, New Year's Eve, continuing overcast and very mild.<br/><br/>Air mass back trajectories indicate relatively clean air arriving from the south Atlantic, Iberian Peninsula and France. Very mild temperatures with a fresh south-westerly breeze for most of the day. Good dispersion expected locally with minimal import of pollution forecast. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates. <br/><br/>With best wishes for the festive period from Imperial ERG.
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
